label: 参議
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The eight extra-Code Consultants, the hardest-working members of the Council of State, supervised the Council's adminsitrative arms and in general functioned as executive secretaries (p. 799). [太政官]
